name: Crab It Alive!
description:
Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 46. Theme was "keep it alive".

CONTROLS:

* WASD/Arrow keys to move

* Hold left mouse button to grab

* ESC to quit

All art, sound and coding by Carlos Pérez and Nuria Pico.

Source code available at https://github.com/Minimuino/LD46.

Engine: Godot 3.2. Graphics: Illustrator. Sound: LMMS, Audacity.

Thanks for playing :]

Release notes

We appreciate feedback regarding performance or possible issues on any platform (we couldn't test as we've liked). Nuria Pico made every single asset present in the game, including the recording of all sound effects using only her voice and random home stuff.

Making this game has been so much fun for us. Hope you enjoy it too!
